<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="173" height="80">

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChatViewSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="750" height="1206">
	<e:Rect id="chatRect" width="100%" height="100%" alpha="0"/>
	<e:Group id="chatGroup" y="800" x="177">
		<e:Image x="0" y="0" source="chatbg1_png"/>
		<e:RadioButton id="textBtn" label="" y="9" selected="true" x="8.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image source="leftTitleBg1_png" source.down="leftTitleBg_png" scale9Grid="23,14,229,33"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="faceImg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:RadioButton>
		<e:RadioButton id="faceBtn" label="" x="277" y="9" selected="false" width="265">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image height="100%" source="rightTitleBg1_png" source.down="rightTitleBg_png" scale9Grid="63,21,193,29"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="textImg_png"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:RadioButton>
		<e:Scroller id="textScroller" height="260" y="71"  x="28">
			<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" height="341.85" width="500">
				<e:Group x="-1.4210854715202004e-14" y="0" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text1" text="不好意思啊，我要离开一会儿" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" verticalAlign="middle" width="100%" x="10" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" verticalCenter="0" height="24"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="9.999999999999986" y="10" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text2" text="不要吵了，不要吵了，专心玩游戏吧" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" width="100%" x="10" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="19.999999999999986" y="20" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text3" text="不要走，决战到天亮" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" width="100%" x="10" y="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="29.999999999999986" y="30" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text4" text="大家好，很高兴见到各位" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" width="100%" x="10" y="0" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="39.999999999999986" y="40" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text5" text="底牌亮出来，绝对吓死你" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" width="100%" x="10" y="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="49.999999999999986" y="50" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text6" text="风水轮流转，底裤都输光了" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" width="100%" x="10" y="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="59.999999999999986" y="60" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text7" text="和你合作真是太愉快了" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" width="100%" x="10" y="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="69.99999999999999" y="70" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text8" text="交个朋友吧，能告诉我联系方法吗" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" width="100%" x="10" y="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="79.99999999999999" y="80" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text9" text="竟然被看穿了，你真厉害" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" width="100%" x="10" y="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group x="89.99999999999999" y="90" height="40">
					<e:Image x="0" source="contentBg_png" width="500" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label id="text10" text="看我通杀全场，这些钱全是我的" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" height="24" verticalAlign="middle" size="24" textColor="0xffdaaa" width="100%" x="10" y="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
